#sidebar TOC

= Resource: trackbackcount =

*Description:* Count of posts referencing an url.

*URL Format:* `http://otter.topsy.com/trackbackcount.`[ResponseFormats format]`?query=parameters`

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| url      || required   || URL string for the target. ||
|| contains || optional   || A query filter for trackbacks (the trackbacks must contain this string). ||

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/trackbackcount.json?url=http://topsy.com/
}}}

This will fetch only the trackback counts in json format that reference Topsy's homepage.
